meanings.sent1: After disappearing into thin air, the magician was able to rematerialize on stage.
meanings.sent2: The ghostly figure seemed to rematerialize in front of our eyes.
meanings.sent3: The spilled water on the floor seemed to rematerialize into a puddle, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of becoming a singer began to rematerialize as she practiced every day.
meanings.sent5: The memories of her childhood home rematerialize vividly in her mind.

meanings.sent1: The fog started to rematerialize into droplets of water on the leaves.
meanings.sent2: The spaceship was able to rematerialize after passing through the asteroid field.
meanings.sent3: The melted chocolate began to rematerialize into a solid form as it cooled down.
meanings.sent4: His confidence started to rematerialize as he received positive feedback on his work.
meanings.sent5: The scattered pieces of the puzzle rematerialize into a complete picture in her hands.
